name: Sister Bliss
description: '''Ayalah Deborah Bentovim''' (born 30 December 1970), better known by her stage name '''Sister Bliss''', is a British keyboardist, record producer, DJ and songwriter. In the studio, she is best known for her work with [[Rollo Armstrong]] as one half of the production duo Rollo & Sister Bliss, and particularly as part of [[Faithless]].
